remarks: Lemma for ~ exidres and ~ exidresid .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)
statement:
exidres.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
exidres.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
exidres.3 $e |- H = ( G |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
exidreslem $p |- ( ( G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) /\ Y C_ X /\ U e. Y ) -> ( U e. dom dom H /\ A. x e. dom dom H ( ( U H x ) = x /\ ( x H U ) = x ) ) ) $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d U x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
